comments.text: Can´t remember if it was at this precise point exactly. The spot was just next to the immigration center. All of the truck drivers that go through this road, park next to it to do the paperwork. There is a Petrobras gas station close by also and hitching with a thomb is good also.

Tuvo un día de lluvia entonces no muy bueno por hacer dedo, no obstante este  quiero decir que demorei 6 horas.
Tal vez una muller con día de sol espera meno...
Parece que el dedo en Paraguay funciona mucho mejor en área rural...
Suerte a todos!
Roberto mx
Peaje en Minga Guazu, spot for hitching to Asunción. To get here take bus from Ciudad del Este that says Minga Guazu Km 24. Km 24 is a name of a settlement next to the peaje.

The only road to go to Paraguay (even if you are already inside!)
the road is off-track, few cars ride to the main road between Pedro Juan and Conception.
If you found a bus (2 a day) jump in!
